description:
Automatically sync Papirus folder icon colors with your GNOME accent color. Changes folder colors seamlessly when you switch accent colors in Settings.

External Dependencies:
• papirus-icon-theme
• papirus-folders

Extension Homepage:
https://github.com/NiffirgkcaJ/papirus-folders-colorizer
https://gitlab.com/NiffirgkcaJ/papirus-folders-colorizer
name: Papirus Folders Colorizer
